original_text: Hagar is like a picture of Sinai mountain in Arabia. Also, she is like the city of Jerusalem here on earth now, because that city and its people are slaves under the authority of God's Law.
korean_text: 이 하갈은 아라비아에 있는 시내 산으로서 지금 있는 예루살렘과 같은 곳이니 그가 그 자녀들과 더불어 종 노릇 하고

sentences.original_text: Hagar is like a picture of Sinai mountain
Also, she is like the city of Jerusalem
because that city and its people are slaves
sentences.korean_translation: 그 성과 그 백성들이 종이기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: under the authority of God's Law
